value.title: Get only the rows you need in Power Query from your files.
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to find the rows you need and import those instead of importing everything and then filtering them. value.title: Automatically Send Power BI Report as PDF or PPT format in Email

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Dynamically Filter By Today's Date
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to dynamically filter by today's date.
